personal.name: Veera Venkata Sai Mane
personal.title: Software Developer
personal.tagline: Java Full Stack Developer with 4 years of experience across e-commerce, logistics, and cloud infrastructure domains
personal.bio: Java Full Stack Developer with 4 years of experience building high-performance, scalable web and cloud-native applications. Skilled in developing RESTful microservices with Spring Boot, creating responsive frontends using React/Angular, and deploying on AWS/Azure with Docker and Kubernetes. Experienced in debugging complex issues, implementing CI/CD pipelines for automated delivery, and driving performance optimization within Agile teams across e-commerce, logistics, and cloud infrastructure enterprise domains.

hero.headline: I build scalable enterprise applications
hero.subheadline: Java Full Stack Developer with 4 years of experience specializing in Spring Boot microservices, React/Angular frontends, and AWS/Azure cloud deployments.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better
description: I'm Veera Venkata Sai Mane, a Software Developer based in Hyderabad with 4 years of professional experience across e-commerce, logistics, and cloud infrastructure enterprise domains.

My expertise spans backend development with Java and Spring Boot microservices, frontend development with React and Angular, and cloud deployments on AWS and Azure with Docker and Kubernetes. I'm experienced in implementing CI/CD pipelines, automating workflows with Ansible, and integrating enterprise tools like ServiceNow, OpenStack, and Kafka.

I've built logistics portals, e-commerce platforms like VibeCart, collaborative shopping features for Williams-Sonoma, and the Polycloud Platform — improving cloud resource management by 60% and reducing server provisioning time by 85%.
highlights: 4+ years of hands-on enterprise development
Multi-Cloud Certified — AWS, Azure & Oracle
Architected scalable microservices & cloud-native solutions
Drove end-to-end CI/CD & infrastructure automation
Domain expertise in e-commerce, logistics & SaaS platforms
Full Stack — Spring Boot, React, Docker & Kubernetes

positions.description: Working as a Consultant on Dell Inc.'s logistics portals, delivering new features, migrating legacy systems to microservices, and resolving high-severity security vulnerabilities.
highlights: Developed and enhanced logistics portals (GOLF, Dragon, TIP, 3PL) for Dell Inc. Delivered Reports modules and Vendor UI/UX enhancements
Migrated legacy systems to microservices architecture with flag-based feature enablement for controlled releases
Resolved high-severity security vulnerabilities using secure coding practices, dependency upgrades, and configuration hardening
Enhanced Work Order processing for upgraded vendor XML integrations, improving data accuracy and third-party onboarding
Automated multilingual (Spanish) reports and implemented Print Receipt Generation service for traceability and audit readiness
Performed production support and critical bug fixes, improving system stability and reducing operational incidents

positions.description: Built VibeCart e-commerce platform and contributed to Williams-Sonoma's Share Cart and Registry features for collaborative shopping experiences.
highlights: Developed VibeCart, a scalable e-commerce platform using Spring Boot and React with microservices architecture
Led Account Management and Offer Management Services - designed and implemented core features
Contributed to Williams-Sonoma's Share Cart feature, enabling users to share shopping carts for collaborative shopping
Developed the Registry feature for Williams-Sonoma, allowing users to create event registries and share them for gift purchases

positions.description: Developed and deployed the Infosys Polycloud Platform, a multi-cloud management tool. Integrated 8+ enterprise tools, automated 18+ use cases, and achieved significant performance improvements.
highlights: Developed and deployed Infosys Polycloud Platform, improving cloud resource management by 60%
Integrated 8+ tools (ServiceNow, OpenStack, Ceph, NetApp, Cloudian, OP5Monitor) into the Polycloud framework
Reduced OpenStack server provisioning time by 85% through automation workflows
Created end-to-end automation solutions using Ansible and integrated APIs, streamlining 18+ use cases and reducing manual intervention by 70%
Developed Polycloud UI dashboards for trend visualization and forecasting, reducing decision-making time by 65%
Led cloud decommissioning project, reducing manual efforts and time by 88%

items.title: Dell Logistics Portals (GOLF, Dragon, TIP, 3PL)
items.description: Enterprise logistics portals with Reports modules, Vendor UI/UX, microservices migration, and multilingual automation.
items.longDescription: Developed and enhanced multiple logistics portals including GOLF, Dragon, TIP, and 3PL. Delivered new features including Reports modules and Vendor UI/UX enhancements. Migrated legacy systems to microservices with flag-based feature enablement. Automated multilingual reports and implemented Print Receipt Generation service.

items.title: VibeCart - E-Commerce Platform
items.description: Scalable e-commerce platform with Account Management and Offer Management microservices.
items.longDescription: Developed VibeCart, a comprehensive e-commerce platform using Spring Boot and React. Led Account Management and Offer Management Services with microservices architecture including API Gateway, Supply Chain Management, Order Fulfillment, and Discovery services.

items.title: Williams-Sonoma: Share Cart & Registry
items.description: Collaborative shopping features enabling cart sharing and event registry creation for gift purchases.
items.longDescription: Contributed to Williams-Sonoma's Share Cart feature enabling users to share their shopping carts for collaborative shopping experiences. Developed the Registry feature allowing users to create event registries, share them with others, and add items seamlessly for gift purchases.

items.title: Infosys Polycloud Platform
items.description: Multi-cloud management tool improving cloud resource management by 60%, integrating 8+ enterprise tools with automated workflows.
items.longDescription: Developed and deployed the Polycloud Platform, a multi-cloud management tool that improved cloud resource management by 60%. Integrated 8+ tools (ServiceNow, OpenStack, Ceph, NetApp, Cloudian, OP5Monitor). Reduced server provisioning time by 85% through automation. Created UI dashboards for trend visualization reducing decision-making time by 65%. Led cloud decommissioning project reducing manual efforts by 88%.

items.title: QKart - E-Commerce Application
items.description: E-commerce application with authentication, product search, shopping cart, and checkout built during Crio program.
items.longDescription: Built an e-commerce application offering a variety of products. Implemented core logic for authentication, product display and search, shopping cart and checkout. Enhanced UI for responsive design across devices ensuring consistent user experience.

items.title: QTify - Audio Streaming Service
items.description: Digital audio streaming platform with modular UI components, genre-based filtering, and API integration.
items.longDescription: Built a digital audio streaming service providing free access to music, podcasts, and curated playlists. Created modular UI components including Cards, Carousels, and Buttons optimized for reusability. Implemented intuitive genre-based song filtering system.

items.title: QTrip - Travel Website
items.description: Adventure travel website with multi-select filters, image carousels, and conditional rendering.
items.longDescription: Built a travel website for adventure seekers. Created web pages using HTML and CSS, made them dynamic using JavaScript. Improved UX with multi-select filters, image carousels, and implemented conditional rendering of page elements.

items.title: EBook - Spring Microservices App
items.description: Microservices-based e-book management system with CRUD operations and inter-service communication.
items.longDescription: Built a microservices-based e-book management system using Spring Boot. Features include book catalog management, user management, and inter-service communication patterns demonstrating microservices architecture principles.

items.title: Cloud Config POC
items.description: Spring Cloud Config Server proof of concept for centralized microservices configuration management.
items.longDescription: Implemented a Spring Cloud Config Server proof of concept demonstrating centralized configuration management for microservices with remote config repository, dynamic property refresh, and environment-specific configurations.

items.title: Kafka Messaging System
items.description: Apache Kafka implementation for event-driven messaging between microservices.
items.longDescription: Built a Kafka-based messaging system demonstrating producer-consumer patterns, topic management, and event-driven architecture for microservices communication.

items.title: ExpensesTracker
items.description: Personal expense tracking application for managing daily finances and budgets.
items.longDescription: Built a personal finance management tool for tracking daily expenses, categorizing spending, and visualizing budget data with expense entry, category management, and spending analytics.

items.title: XWeatherApp
items.description: Real-time weather application with location-based forecasts and weather data visualization.
items.longDescription: Created a weather application with current conditions, forecasts, and weather data display. Integrated with weather APIs for real-time data and geolocation services.

items.title: LawFirm Website
items.description: Professional website for a law firm with service listings and contact management.
items.longDescription: Built a professional law firm website with service descriptions, attorney profiles, case study showcases, and client contact forms. Focused on professional design and user trust.

items.name: Oracle Cloud Infrastructure 2025 AI Foundations Associate

items.institution: Vignan's Lara Institute of Technology & Science
